DataTransferGetData.summary:
The DataTransfer.getData()
method retrieves drag data (as a string) for the specified type.
If the drag operation does not include data, this method returns an empty
string.

remarks.para: Example data types are text/plain and text/uri-list.

-Drag and drop
-Drag Operations
-Recommended Drag Types
-DataTransfer test - Paste or Drag

DataTransferGetData.returns: A string representing the drag data for the specified format. If the drag operation has no data or the operation has no data for the specified format, this method returns an empty string.
